attributes.additional_details: As I live about a mile or so away from the main supplier nationwide their representative has blatantly lied and said they don't test. They do test them a couple of days before bonfire night in the afternoon. And will do again before New Year.
attributes.background: Stop manufacturers causing distress to society from fireworks by importing, selling and lying about testing them

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
